docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Generate professional CVs from structured data
  • Multiple output formats (PDF, etc.)
  • Customizable templates
  • Easy to use Python API

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
pip install generatecv

import generatecv

# Your CV generation code here

docs.title: Code Quality
docs.text:
uv run ruff check .
uv run ruff format --check .

docs.title: Examples
docs.text: Here are some examples of using generatecv.
